input_type.script:
#!/bin/bash
ExtensionVersion=""
if [ -f /Applications/Skype.app/Contents/Info.plist ] then ExtensionVersion=$(defaults read /Applications/Skype.app/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleVersion) fi
if [ "$ExtensionVersion" == "" ] then ExtensionVersion="Not Installed" fi
echo "<result>$ExtensionVersion</result>"
exit 0
